Articles.Content:
I've got an old mod that I really enjoy, but it relies on the old Firespitter texture switching plugin to change liveries.  Unfortunately, I've been having stability issues with the FS plugin in the current version.  A lot of newer mods use the stock variant switcher B9 Part Switch to change liveries, so what do I need to do to set that up on these old mod parts?

EDIT: I guess this is a feature of the B9 part switcher, not a stock thing.

Edited May 18 by Capt. Hunt
